description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing endpoints for greeting, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing endpoints for greeting, documentation redirection, health check, and info about the application.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the user to the Swagger UI page, preserving the original request URL scheme and host.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns the health status of the application.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application.
